interface.inputVars: {% for key, values in dictInputVars.items() %}{% include "xml_templates/structure/variable.xml" %}{% endfor %}
interface.outputVars: {% for key, values in dictOutputVars.items() %}{% include "xml_templates/structure/variable.xml" %}{% endfor %}

body.FBD: {% for key, values in dictInputVars.items() %}{% include "xml_templates/structure/FbdInVar.xml" %}{% endfor %}{% for key, values in dictParameters.items() %}{% include "xml_templates/structure/FbdPar.xml" %}{% endfor %}{% for key, values in dictFunctionBlockInstances.items() %}{% include "xml_templates/structure/block.xml" %}{% endfor %}{% for key, values in dictFunctionBlockInstancesIEC.items() %}{% include "xml_templates/structure/blockIEC.xml" %}{% endfor %}{% for key, values in dictOutputVars.items() %}{% include "xml_templates/structure/FbdOutVar.xml" %}{% endfor %}
